com.basho.riak.client.core.query.links

Class RiakLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.query.links.RiakLink

  • public class RiakLink
extends Object
    Models a link from one object to another in Riak.

    Links are metadata that establish one-way relationships between objects in Riak. They can be used to loosely model graph like relationships between objects in Riak.

    Data in Riak is character asSet agnostic; it's simply raw bytes. Methods are provided here to either use your default character asSet or supply a specific one to convert to and from Strings.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Russel Brown , Brian Roach

    • Constructor Detail

      • RiakLink

        public RiakLink(String bucket,
        String key,
        String tag)
        Create a RiakLink from the specified parameters.

        The values are stored internally as bytes. The default Charset will be used to convert the supplied Strings

        Parameters:
        bucket - the bucket name
        key - the key
        tag - the link tag

      • RiakLink

        public RiakLink(String bucket,
        String key,
        String tag,
        Charset charset)
        Create a RiakLink from the specified parameters.

        The values are stored internally as bytes. The supplied Charset will be used to convert the supplied Strings

        Parameters:
        bucket - the bucket
        key - the key
        tag - the link tag
        charset - the character asSet for the supplied Strings
